REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f1753 reute h f BC-FISERVE-<FISV>-GETS-B 04-03 0061

TEXT.TITLE: FISERVE <FISV> GETS BUSINESS WORTH ONE MLN DLRS
TEXT.BODY: FIserve Inc said 14 savings and loans with 1.5 billion dlrs in cumulative assets will transfer their data processing to FIserve from Midwest Commerce Data Corp, a unit of Midwest Commerce Corp. About one mln dlrs a year in new recurring revenues will be generated for FIserve, it said. Reuter
